responses.q5: Use YEAR function on the date
responses.q8: Absolute locks the cell, relative moves
responses.q10: Make a pivot and then chart it

strengths: Write a formula to calculate the average of numbers in column E, ignoring blanks.
Write a formula that extracts the year from a date in cell F2.
Explain difference between Absolute ($A$1) and Relative (A1) references in formulas.
weaknesses: Give a formula to lookup value in C2 from a table where key is in column A, robust to column re-ordering.
Consider using XLOOKUP or INDEX/MATCH which handle column re-ordering and provide clearer syntax.

review_queue.question: Write an Excel formula to count how many cells in range D2:D100 contain text.
Give a formula to lookup value in C2 from a table where key is in column A, robust to column re-ordering.
